::Hot Rod::

The pain from the dagger in his neck nearly puts Hot Rod in to stasis.
"He...lp! I ne...ed hel...p!"
Hot Rod fights the pain enough to stick his gun barrel in Hell Beast's
mouth. He struggles to say.
"Yippie Kiae, mother fucker!"
He the pulls the trigger 8 times.
